description:
A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool, using the InfluxDB exporter.

inspire from https://grafana.com/dashboards/2587 & k6 cloud dashboard.

simple & informative dashboard

targets.query: SELECT sum("value")/${interval_value} FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201') AND $timeFilter group by time(${interval_value}s)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT max("value") FROM "vus_max" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT status from (SELECT "host","method", "value" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","name","status" )
SELECT count(*),"status" from (SELECT "host","method", "value", "status" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","name","status" )

SELECT percentile("value", 95) as PERCENTILE_95, percentile("value", 99) as PERCENTILE_99, max("value") as  max_response_time, mean("value") as  avg_response_time, min("value") as  min_response_time, count("value") as  count    FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY "host","name","status","method"  fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/${interval_value} as RPS FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") as iteration FROM "iterations" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as VUS FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as Response_Time FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT ("value") as Response_Time FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") as Response_Time FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value")/${interval_value} FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "iterations" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "vus" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${interval_value}s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("status" != '200' AND "status" != '201' ) AND $timeFilter group by status, method, "name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_req_duration" WITH KEY = "name"
list.label: URL
list.name: URL
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "http_req_duration" WITH KEY = "name"

title: K6 Dashboard
